Articles.Content: Hey all my name is Acheuro and I really love space. I've owned KSP for awhile but haven't really gotten into it until recently. I hope to talk to you all and I'm looking foward to getting better at the game with the help of the forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hello and welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Welcome, Acheuro! Hang out and see what these amazing people have created
